metadata.subject: Louis XIV, King of France, 1638-1715
Anne, Queen, consort of Louis XIII, King of France, 1601-1666
metadata.title: Arrhes de paix vniverselle svr les ceremonies et allegresses faites a Rome, povr le roy tres-chrestien Lovis XIV dit Dieu-donné : presentez a la reine regente à sainct Germain en Laye.
metadata.creator: Labbé, Jacques.
Labbé, Jacques
Daubray
metadata.publisher: A Paris : Chez I. Petrinal :;& Nicolas Iacqvard ..., 1649
metadata.description: Title page vignette, headpiece and large initial, p. 3
Dedicatory epistle signed, p. 5: Iacqves Labbé
Dated: Permis faire imprimer ce traité intitulé Arrhes de paix vniverselle, & c. Fait ce xvii. avril 1649
Collection of prose and verse to the regent and Louis XIV
metadata.notes: No copyright page found. No table-of-contents pages found. Damaged, stained, marked, torn and/or loose pages. Uneven binding. Skewed text. Text is lost in the binding or extends off of the edge of the page. Title and cover page are combined.
